doc.previous: While many renewable energy projects are large scale renewable technologies are also suited to rural and remote areas and developing countries where energy is often crucial in human development United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki moon has said that renewable energy has the ability to lift the poorest nations to new levels of prosperity
